data.name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Attachments Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Adorn your Monstrums with an entire wardrobe of more than 30 attachments, self-assertion panels, headwear, and weapons!

Ride-Along Aprilis
Ride-Along Morbihan
Ride-Along Geis
Ride-Along White Cat
Ride-Along Raging Bull
Monstrum Musings Set
Eyewear Set A
Eyewear Set B
Unique Mask Set
Variety Mask Set
Haute Cuisine Weapon Set
